thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 21 of 97
thread.title: Virginia Flynn

author: Virginia Flynn
title: Virginia Flynn
text: I recently discovered Biblio.com and am amazed at being to find so many books, even some out of print, at such great prices. Some come gently used and some are like new. I live in the US and I have found books that seem only to be available in the UK. Even with overseas postage they are a tremendous bargain and they arrive quickly. This bibliophile loves Biblio.com.
